name: The Isle Is Full Of Noises
name_original: The Isle Is Full Of Noises
description:
A storm is upon you. Your boat is small... and your destination shrouded. Follow the moon and greet your fellow travellers with care.

Your destiny awaits beyond the westbound lights... in the island's cavernous depths. Be not afeard... the isle is full of noises.

game by dreamfeel
music by anna meredith


The Isle is Full of Noises is a '#flatgame'. There's intentionally no interaction or even collisions, except for moving the pieces around the screen. It's focused on presenting a game as the most raw and immediate combination of movement, art and sound. The Flat Game manifesto says that all you need to make a game and to present an idea is a couple hours, a laptop, and some markers. ~6 minutes in length

Scene II.zip is the most up to date version, but isle.zip is the original replete with swearing.
